fax4j-x2fax 0.0.9 API

Overview:

See:
          Description

Packages
org.fax4j.x2fax.cli Provides standalone CLI utility to send faxes.
org.fax4j.x2fax.email.james Provides Apache JAMES mailet to extend the JAMES email server and give it email2fax capbilities.
org.fax4j.x2fax.http.servlet Provides generic servlet which can be deployed on any java web server to provide web2fax service.
org.fax4j.x2fax.http.servlet.jetty Provides standalone Jetty HTTP server that provides web2fax services.
org.fax4j.x2fax.util Provides general utilities used internally by the fax4j x2fax library.

 

Overview:

The fax4j x2fax is a set of standalone servers and deployable components which enable to provide x2fax services. Already comes with built-in email component to enhance email servers to provide email2fax services and HTTP servers and WARs to convert any web server to a web2fax bridge.
The x2fax is a sub project of the java fax library: fax4j

Installation/Setup:

Each server/component has it's installation/setup requirements.
Those installation instructions can be found in each server/component directory.

Author:
Sagie Gur-Ari
